body_html:
Met the same problem:

torch.baddbmm(beta1=1.0,
                           mat=self.bias.view(1, 1, 1),
                           alpha=1.0,
                           batch1=test_feats,
                           batch2=cls_weights.transpose(1, 2))

TypeError: baddbmm() missing 3 required positional argument: "input", "batch1", "batch2"

body:
Met the same problem:
```
torch.baddbmm(beta1=1.0,
                           mat=self.bias.view(1, 1, 1),
                           alpha=1.0,
                           batch1=test_feats,
                           batch2=cls_weights.transpose(1, 2))
```
TypeError: baddbmm() missing 3 required positional argument: "input", "batch1", "batch2"
